name: spring vibes coffee sleeve
notes:
celebrate spring with a pop of color! 

* fits hot or iced coffee cups- ideal for unpredictable spring weather! 

* full coverage, even the base- protects hands and tables from heat, cold, and condensation 

* easy pattern- ideal for beginners or anyone looking for a quick colorful project 

* great scrappy project- only takes about 35m/38yds 

* it's free! 

i hope you enjoy this quick and cute cozy as much as i do. it really brightens up even the grayer days while being genuinely useful. i can't wait to see your projects! 

questions and comments welcome, just use ravelry messages or comment on the pattern. enjoy!
